properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID of this piece of equipment

properties.name: assetID
properties.description: The asset ID tag assigned to this piece of equipment is one has been allocated

properties.name: name
properties.description: The human readable name of this equipment

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: The original manufacturer of this equipment

properties.name: model
properties.description: The specific model of this equipment

properties.name: miscIdentifier
properties.description: An additional identifier in the event the manufacturer and model are not sufficient

properties.name: amount
properties.description: The amount of this piece of equipment currently available

properties.name: location
properties.description: The venue in which this equipment is stored

properties.name: locationSpecifier
properties.description: Additional information about where in the venue this piece of equipment has been stored

properties.name: manager
properties.description: The user assigned to manage this piece of equipment and should be the first call when needing information about it

properties.name: date
properties.description: The date the equipment was purchased

properties.name: category
properties.description: The textual category of this equipment
